The proposed questions demonstrate a strong commitment to ensuring the uniqueness and value of the hypothesis by actively seeking diverse perspectives, synthesizing existing literature, and fostering collaboration with experts in the field. These strategies not only enhance the scientific rigor and clinical relevance of the hypothesis but also promote innovation and the generation of impactful research findings. Well done on focusing on these critical aspects of hypothesis development. 

Is there a specific plan in place for dissemination of the research findings to ensure that the innovative contributions reach a broad audience and have the potential to influence real-world medical practice?
